titleStmt.title: A dialogue suppos'd to be between a evnuch boy and a virgin sung by Bowen and Mrs. Cross in a new play call'd Ibrahim / set to musick by Mr. Daniel Purcell ; written by Mr. Durfey ; and exactly engrav'd by Tho. Cross.
titleStmt.author: Purcell, Daniel, 1660?-1717.

notesStmt.note: First staff reads: Fly, fly from my sight ...
